thread.title: Ghanaian pride: Watch Francis Owusu make catch of the year in US College football
thread.title_full: Ghanaian pride: Watch Francis Owusu make catch of the year in US College football

title: Ghanaian pride: Watch Francis Owusu make catch of the year in US College football
text:
15:55 CET Ghanaian pride: Watch Francis Owusu make catch of the year in US College football 
Want to see the best catch of the year?Here you go. Just click the video above...That's Stanford receiver Francis Owusu pinning a touchdown pass against the back of defensive back Jaleel Wadood. Not only did Owusu make the catch, but he kept control of the ball as both players fell to the ground. 
The touchdown gave Stanford a 42-17 lead early in the third quarter against the Bruins. It also gave Owusu a play people will be talking about for years. 
That certainly is one pride for Ghanaian pride, Owusu's name certainly depicts his roots from this country. play Its certainly one of the best catches you'll ever see - Francis Owusu catches ball for touchdown behind the defender's back 
For more sports news visit allSports.com.gh
